summary: Completed comprehensive E2E testing of prescription management app. All major features working correctly including authentication, prescription CRUD operations, medicine autocomplete, search functionality, and PDF generation.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of expected 401 for unauthorized access
minor_bugs.impact: No functional impact - both indicate authentication failure

passed_tests: Dashboard loads with all required elements
Create prescription form with patient details
View prescription details with proper formatting
Download prescription as PDF from dashboard
Download prescription as PDF from view page
Medicine search API (with and without query)
